SEARCH
Package com.downloader

Class Downloader

java.lang.Object
com.downloader.Downloader
public class Downloader extends Object
Represents a Downloader node in the system. A Downloader is responsible for downloading web pages and extracting their content. It communicates with the Dispatcher via RMI and multicast.

  • Constructor Details

    • Downloader

      public Downloader() throws IOException, NotBoundException
      Constructs a Downloader object with default properties. Initializes the Downloader's socket, multicast address, and connects to the Dispatcher via RMI.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the multicast socket.
      NotBoundException - If the Dispatcher RMI lookup fails.

  • Method Details

    • download

      void download(String url) throws RuntimeException
      Downloads a web page, extracts its content, and sends it to the Dispatcher.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the web page to download.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs while downloading the web page.

    • multicastMsg

      void multicastMsg(org.json.JSONObject content)
      Sends a multicast message to the network.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the message to send.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the Downloader. Continuously downloads web pages from the Dispatcher.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments.
